1.title: Mazar-i Sharif
1.plot: Sabour heads to Mazar for Naw Ruz (New Year), camel fighting and poetry, and ends up competing in the most dangerous sport in the world, buzkashi.

2.title: Kandahar
2.plot: Sabour reveals the unseen side of Afghanistan. In Kandahar, he wrestles in an Afghan death match, patrols with a famous female detective and meets a former Taliban member.

4.title: Herat/Bamiyan
4.plot: Sabour tries to turn pro bodybuilder before traversing one of the world's most dangerous landscapes in search of a cure for his inner demons.

5.title: Badakhshan/Kuchis
5.plot: Sabour travels to the spectacular mountains of Badakshan to track down the nearly extinct Snow Leopard and then travels half way across the country to trek across the desert with the rarely seen Kuchi nomads.

6.title: Tora Bora/Logar (US Military)
6.plot: Sabour treks deep into the mountains where Osama bin Laden eluded capture and spends a tense night in the company of US troops.

-1.title: Mazar-i Sharif
-1.plot: Sabour races to Mazar-i Sharif for the famous Naw Ruz (New Year) celebrations and ends up getting involved in poetry and camel fighting, and competing in the most dangerous sport in the world, Buzkashi.

imdb.plot outline: Extreme Tourism involves travellers searching for raw and dangerous experiences that haven't been packaged by travel companies. But what if there was a TV show that went beyond that? A travel series combining all the danger, difficulty and intrigue of traveling across a war zone like Afghanistan while searching for the real focus of the show, incredible Afghans and their amazing stories. Follow presenter Sabour Bradley as he auditions for Afghan Idol, throws a barbecue in Osama's backyard, tracks down the Taliban, hangs with warlords, gets treated for stress by a scorpion doctor, spars with the Afghan female boxing team, wrestles in an Afghan death match, hunts down the snow leopard, and travels across one of the most epic and dangerous landscapes in the world. The Extreme Tourist: Afghanistan is a 6x60' travel series that opens the door on the new Afghanistan; takes you beyond the myth, beyond the bloodshed, beyond the Taliban, beyond the burka and beyond the 'extreme'.
